name: Trade Tracker Journal (Trading) for Notion

Have you ever wished for a simple yet powerful tool to document and analyze your trades, providing valuable insights for your trading strategies? Look no further! features: User-Friendly Design:Our Trade Tracker Journal is crafted with simplicity in mind, ensuring that both beginners and experienced traders can effortlessly navigate and utilize its features.; Enhanced Performance:By systematically documenting and analyzing your trades, you'll be equipped to make informed decisions, leading to improved overall performance.; Informed Decision-Making:Make strategic decisions based on historical trade data and analysis. The Trade Tracker Journal provides the knowledge you need to navigate the markets with confidence.; Efficient Learning:Learn from your past experiences by adding detailed notes and observations for each trade. Leverage this knowledge to continually evolve as a trader.; Trade Details:Capture essential trade information such as date and time, trading pair or asset, long or short position, entry and exit prices, stop-loss, and take-profit levels.; Trade Size:Track the number of units or contracts, along with the percentage of your portfolio risked for each trade.; Chart Integration:Embed price charts for the traded asset at entry and exit points, offering a visual representation of your trading decisions.; Net P&L Calculation:Manually calculate Net Profit and Loss, providing a clear overview of the overall financial outcome of your trading activities.
